GloAspectClE_5min.name: AspectClE
GloAspectClE_5min.description: Aspect class for East-facing slopes, representing the direction of the slope gradient in the Eastward direction.

GloAspectClN_5min.name: AspectClN
GloAspectClN_5min.description: Aspect class for North-facing slopes, representing the direction of the slope gradient towards the north.

GloAspectClS_5min.name: AspectClS
GloAspectClS_5min.description: Aspect class for South-facing slopes, representing the direction of the slope gradient towards the south.

GloAspectClU_5min.name: AspectClU
GloAspectClU_5min.description: Aspect class for undefined slope aspects where the slope gradient is either undefined or less than a certain threshold.

GloAspectClW_5min.name: AspectClW
GloAspectClW_5min.description: Aspect class for West-facing slopes, representing the direction of the slope gradient towards the west.

GloElev_5min.name: Elevation
GloElev_5min.description: Median elevation data for each grid cell, measured in meters above sea level.

GloLand_5min.name: LandMask
GloLand_5min.description: Land mask indicating the fraction of 3 arc-second grid cells that fall into a 5-minute

GloSlopesCl1_5min.name: SlopesCl1
GloSlopesCl1_5min.description: Percentage of grid cells with slope between 0% and 0.5%.

GloSlopesCl2_5min.name: SlopesCl2
GloSlopesCl2_5min.description: Percentage of grid cells with slope between 0.5% and 2%.

GloSlopesCl3_5min.name: SlopesCl3
GloSlopesCl3_5min.description: Percentage of grid cells with slope between 2% and 5%.

GloSlopesCl4_5min.name: SlopesCl4
GloSlopesCl4_5min.description: Percentage of grid cells with slope between 5% and 10%.

GloSlopesCl5_5min.name: SlopesCl5
GloSlopesCl5_5min.description: Percentage of grid cells with slope between 10% and 15%.

GloSlopesCl6_5min.name: SlopesCl6
GloSlopesCl6_5min.description: Percentage of grid cells with slope between 15% and 30%.

GloSlopesCl7_5min.name: SlopesCl7
GloSlopesCl7_5min.description: Percentage of grid cells with slope between 30% and 45%.

GloSlopesCl8_5min.name: SlopesCl8
GloSlopesCl8_5min.description: Percentage of grid cells with slope greater than 45%.

CULTIR_2000.name: CULTIR
CULTIR_2000.description: Data on rain-fed cultivated land for the year 2000, representing the percentage of the grid cell used for rainfed agriculture.

CULTRF_2000.name: CULTRF
CULTRF_2000.description: Data on irrigated cultivated land for the year 2000, representing the percentage of the grid cell used for irrigation-based agriculture.

CULT_2000.name: CULT
CULT_2000.description: Total cultivated land data for the year 2000, representing the total percentage of the grid cell used for agriculture.

FOR_2000.name: FOR
FOR_2000.description: Forest area data for the year 2000, representing the percentage of the grid cell covered by forests.

GRS_2000.name: GRS
GRS_2000.description: Grassland area data for the year 2000, representing the percentage of the grid cell covered by grasslands.

NVG_2000.name: NVG
NVG_2000.description: Non-vegetated area data for the year 2000, showing the percentage of the grid cell that is not covered by vegetation.

URB_2000.name: URB
URB_2000.description: Urban area data for the year 2000, representing the percentage of the grid cell that is urbanized.

WAT_2000.name: WAT
WAT_2000.description: Water body area data for the year 2000, showing the percentage of the grid cell covered by water bodies.

sq1.name: sq1
sq1.description: A square grid class for classification purposes, related to nutrient availability.

sq2.name: sq2
sq2.description: A square grid class for classification purposes, related to nutrient retention capacity.

sq3.name: sq3
sq3.description: A square grid class for classification purposes, related to rooting conditions.

sq4.name: sq4
sq4.description: A square grid class for classification purposes, related to oxygen availability to roots.

sq5.name: sq5
sq5.description: A square grid class for classification purposes, related to excess salts.

sq6.name: sq6
sq6.description: A square grid class for classification purposes, related to toxicity.

sq7.name: sq7
sq7.description: A square grid class for classification purposes, related to workability.
